nodes.documentation:
Withdraw an amount of ether from it's balance (it has to be a store owner)
@param amount the amount of ether in Wei to withdraw
nodes.name: withdraw

params._storefrontId: the storefront where to add the product
params.name: name of the new product
params.price: cost in Wei of the product

addProduct(uint256,string,uint256,uint25.return: the ID of the new product

params.name: the name of the new storefront

addStorefront(string).return: the ID of the new storefront

params._sku: the SKU of the product being bought
params.quantity: the desired amount of the product

params._sku: the SKU of the product to remove

params.storeOwner: the address of the store owner count required

getOwnerStorefrontCount(address).return: the amount of storefronts of the specified store owner

params._sku: the SKU of the product required

getProduct(uint256).return: SKU, name, price and storefront ID of the product

params._id: the ID of the storefront information to retrieve

getStorefront(uint256).return: ID, name and SKU array of the storefront

getStorefrontCount().return: the total amount of all storefronts of all owners

params._sku: the SKU of the product to update
params.count: the new count of the product

params._sku: the SKU of the product to update
params.price: the new price of the product

params.amount: the amount of ether in Wei to withdraw

addProduct(uint256,string,uint256,uint25.notice: Adds a new product to a storefront

balance().notice: Get the balance of the sender (it has to be a store owner)

buyProduct(uint256,uint256).notice: Buy a product, incremente store owner's balance by price and quantity, decrement products count by quantity

getOwnerStorefrontCount(address).notice: Gets the amount of storefronts owned by an store owner

getProduct(uint256).notice: Gets the details of a product

getStorefront(uint256).notice: Gets storefront ID, name and list of product SKUs

withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraw an amount of ether from it's balance (it has to be a store owner)
